EnsDeconv 0.1.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    This function is used for process output

    process_all.Rd

    This function is used for process output

    process_all(
  allfold_res,
  allgene_res,
  df_true = NULL,
  trueMet = NULL,
  feature_selection = TRUE,
  lambda = NULL,
  incl_lasso = FALSE,
  get_metric = TRUE,
  rm_dmeths = TRUE,
  r2 = FALSE,
  r2_ind = NULL,
  scale = "log",
  transformation = "CPM",
  optimization = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    allfold_res

    List of output from gen_all_res or gen_all_res_list of two fold

    Each element of list is result for one scenario, which contains element a, p, and ensemble.

    • 'a' Contains p_hat (list, deconvolution results of each fold), p_truth (list, true cell type proportion), n (list, number of markers of each fold), time, markers (list, markers gene of each fold), all_time (computation time)

    • 'p' Parameters

    • 'ensemble' Testing data for each fold

    allgene_res

    List of output from gen_all_res or gen_all_res_list of one fold

    Each element of list is result for one scenario, which contains element a, p, and ensemble.

    • 'a' Contains p_hat (list of deconvolution results), p_truth (list, true cell type proportion), n (list, number of markers of each fold), time, markers (list, markers gene of each fold), all_time (computation time)

    • 'p' Parameters

    • 'ensemble' Testing data for

    df_true

    Dataframe, True cell type expression, samples*cell type

    trueMet

    Character, name of bulk data

    feature_selection

    Logical, conducting feature selection or not

    lambda

    (Optional) tuning parameter for feature selection

    get_metric

    Logical, calculating metric or not

    rm_dmeths

    Logical, remove several deconvolution methods or not when ensemble
